3) strengthen efforts to monitor the occurrence of #neonatal abstinence syndrome

html: Today I was pleased to support & help pass the defense bill - or #NDAA, a bill that supports our men & women in uniform, gives our troops the largest pay raise in almost a decade & provides our military w/tools to continue combating threats around the world & keep us safe.

html: Proud to secure additional funding in a Senate-passed bill to fight wildfires that know no boundaries, provide $12 million to implement my bill to protect #LakeTahoe, & ensure #AlertTahoe is eligible for further resources to prevent wildfires. Learn more: https://bit.ly/2vetHEb
text: Proud to secure additional funding in a Senate-passed bill to fight wildfires that know no boundaries, provide $12 million to implement my bill to protect #LakeTahoe, & ensure #AlertTahoe is eligible for further resources to prevent wildfires. Learn more: https://bit.ly/2vetHEb

html: One of my top priorities is ensuring that Nevada has the resources and tools that it needs to prevent, protect against, and mitigate the damage of wildfires that threaten our communities and the #LakeTahoe Basin that we love.
text: One of my top priorities is ensuring that Nevada has the resources and tools that it needs to prevent, protect against, and mitigate the damage of wildfires that threaten our communities and the #LakeTahoe Basin that we love.

html: Last year was one of the worst fire seasons on record, and this year isn't looking much better as #NV continues to battle the Perry Fire and recover from the 60-mile long Martin Fire, named the largest wildfire in the country earlier this month.
text: Last year was one of the worst fire seasons on record, and this year isn't looking much better as #NV continues to battle the Perry Fire and recover from the 60-mile long Martin Fire, named the largest wildfire in the country earlier this month.

html: As a member of the Senate VA Committee, one of my top priorities is addressing the VA’s doctor shortage that continues to impact #NV’s rural areas such as Elko, Gardnerville & Pahrump, where the clinic that opened its doors two years ago still doesn’t have a full-time doctor.
text: As a member of the Senate VA Committee, one of my top priorities is addressing the VA’s doctor shortage that continues to impact #NV’s rural areas such as Elko, Gardnerville & Pahrump, where the clinic that opened its doors two years ago still doesn’t have a full-time doctor.

html: Today marks six months since the #TaxCutsandJobsAct was signed into law. As a direct result of the new law, thousands of jobs have been created in #NV, around 13,000 Nevadans got a raise & more than 10,000 Nevadans received special bonuses.
text: Today marks six months since the #TaxCutsandJobsAct was signed into law.  As a direct result of the new law, thousands of jobs have been created in #NV, around 13,000 Nevadans got a raise & more than 10,000 Nevadans received special bonuses.

html: Nobody wants to see children separated from their families, period. That’s why I urged Attorney General Jeff Sessions to stop dividing families who have illegally crossed the border until Congress can pass legislation to keep them together.
text: Nobody wants to see children separated from their families, period. That’s why I urged Attorney General Jeff Sessions to stop dividing families who have illegally crossed the border until Congress can pass legislation to keep them together.

html: I along with 11 of my colleagues today urged U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions to stop the practice of separating families who have illegally crossed the U.S.-Mexico border until Congress can pass legislation to keep families together: https://bit.ly/2K4jGyM
text: I along with 11 of my colleagues today urged U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions to stop the practice of separating families who have illegally crossed the U.S.-Mexico border until Congress can pass legislation to keep families together: https://bit.ly/2K4jGyM

html: Whether it’s increasing options for vets in need of a transplant, making it easier for physicians to spend time w/patients, or bringing more transparency to the VA, I’m proud the #VAMISSIONAct contains 3 of my proposals based on feedback from my Veterans Advisory Councils in #NV.
text: Whether it’s increasing options for vets in need of a transplant, making it easier for physicians to spend time w/patients, or bringing more transparency to the VA, I’m proud the #VAMISSIONAct contains 3 of my proposals based on feedback from my Veterans Advisory Councils in #NV.

html: The #VAMISSIONAct improves the VA’s ability to hire high-quality doctors and it allows veterans to get care that works for them, on their schedules, near their homes. It also expands eligibility for the VA Caregiver Program to include veterans of all eras.
text: The #VAMISSIONAct improves the VA’s ability to hire high-quality doctors and it allows veterans to get care that works for them, on their schedules, near their homes. It also expands eligibility for the VA Caregiver Program to include veterans of all eras.

html: Today the U.S. is enacting a law that has been on the books for more than 2 decades by relocating the U.S. embassy to Israel’s true capital, Jerusalem. html: Saddened to hear that my friend Sen. Dean Rhoads has passed away. He served in the #NV legislature for more than three decades & I had the opportunity to serve with him in #CarsonCity during the 1990’s. He was a tireless advocate for his community and a champion for rural #NV.

html: Encouraged to see @GOPHELP unanimously pass the Opioid Crisis Response Act, a bill I cosponsored. Given that #Nevada’s drug overdose mortality rate is 21.7% higher than the national average, I continue to work to advance policies that address the opioid crisis.
text: Encouraged to see @GOPHELP unanimously pass the Opioid Crisis Response Act, a bill I cosponsored. Given that #Nevada’s drug overdose mortality rate is 21.7% higher than the national average, I continue to work to advance policies that address the opioid crisis.

html: By doubling the #ChildTaxCredit & lowering rates on low-income & middle-class families, #NV families finally have the tax relief they’ve been waiting for. That’s what this new tax law is all about, & it’s why I fought to see that Nevadans keep more of their hard-earned money.
text: By doubling the #ChildTaxCredit & lowering rates on low-income & middle-class families, #NV families finally have the tax relief they’ve been waiting for. That’s what this new tax law is all about, & it’s why I fought to see that Nevadans keep more of their hard-earned money.

html: In addition to helping w/ day-to-day costs, the increased #ChildTaxCredit allows families to better plan their futures. For example, Sarah, a single mom living in #NV, used her tax credit to help her & her four children move out of a family shelter & pay rent a year in advance.
text: In addition to helping w/ day-to-day costs, the increased #ChildTaxCredit allows families to better plan their futures. For example, Sarah, a single mom living in #NV, used her tax credit to help her & her four children move out of a family shelter & pay rent a year in advance.

html: As a member of @GOPSenFinance who helped craft the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, I was proud to author the provision that doubled the child tax credit, or increase it from $1,000 to $2,000. This could mean more money to help cover for groceries, school supplies, or diapers.pic.twitter.com/Jfle1jlbWL
text: As a member of @GOPSenFinance who helped craft the #TaxCutsandJobsAct, I was proud to author the provision that doubled the child tax credit, or increase it from $1,000 to $2,000. This could mean more money to help cover for groceries, school supplies, or diapers.pic.twitter.com/Jfle1jlbWL

html: Today is #NationalTaxFilingDay & it’s the last time #Nevadans will have to file taxes under the old, broken system. It’s only been a few months since the #TaxCutsandJobsAct became law, & #Nevadans are already benefiting from bigger paychecks, special bonuses & increased benefits.
text: Today is #NationalTaxFilingDay & it’s the last time #Nevadans will have to file taxes under the old, broken system. It’s only been a few months since the #TaxCutsandJobsAct became law, & #Nevadans are already benefiting from bigger paychecks, special bonuses & increased benefits.

html: Another critical bill rolled into the omni is the #TaylorForceAct, legislation I cosponsored to cut off U.S. economic aid to the Palestinian Authority until they cease pay for slay policies. The bill is named after U.S. Army veteran Taylor Force who was murdered by a PA terrorist

html: I also am pleased to report the omnibus does not gut the Southern Nevada Public Land Management Act, or #SNPLMA, which has helped increase economic development & promote conservation in Southern Nevada.
text: I also am pleased to report the omnibus does not gut the Southern Nevada Public Land Management Act, or #SNPLMA, which has helped increase economic development & promote conservation in Southern Nevada.

html: This legislation includes my #publiclands bill that reauthorizes the Federal Land Transaction Facilitation Act, which allows BLM to sell lands & use funds to acquire environmentally sensitive lands across the nation. More on my bill here: http://bit.ly/2jN8Z7C
text: This legislation includes my #publiclands bill that reauthorizes the Federal Land Transaction Facilitation Act, which allows BLM to sell lands & use funds to acquire environmentally sensitive lands across the nation. More on my bill here: http://bit.ly/2jN8Z7C

html: There are a lot of great wins for #Nevada in this must-pass government funding bill, and I’m proud to report that I fought to secure several of them, including $ to preserve & protect #LakeTahoe, & to support programs that help detect and prevent wildfires.
text: There are a lot of great wins for #Nevada in this must-pass government funding bill, and I’m proud to report that I fought to secure several of them, including $ to preserve & protect #LakeTahoe, & to support programs that help detect and prevent wildfires.

html: Thankful my Veteran Urgent Access to Mental Healthcare Act, which I intro'd w/@SenRubioPress & @JohnCornyn, is in the omnibus. This bill provides mental health treatment to veterans who may not have access to VA benefits. https://bit.ly/2ujBcM3
text: Thankful my Veteran Urgent Access to Mental Healthcare Act, which I intro'd w/@SenRubioPress & @JohnCornyn, is in the omnibus. This bill provides mental health treatment to veterans who may not have access to VA benefits. https://bit.ly/2ujBcM3

html: #NV law enforcement is facing a nearly $2.8 million shortfall due to overtime costs following the Oct. 1st tragedy in #LasVegas. That’s why I fought for additional funding to help compensate these men and women for their service. More here: http://bit.ly/2puOTm9
text: #NV law enforcement is facing a nearly $2.8 million shortfall due to overtime costs following the Oct. 1st tragedy in #LasVegas. That’s why I fought for additional funding to help compensate these men and women for their service. More here: http://bit.ly/2puOTm9

html: After working with the Senate Commerce, Justice, & Science Department Appropriations Subcommittee Chairman Richard Shelby, I’m pleased to announce there is additional funding in the omnibus to help defray costs incurred by law enforcement in #NV following the Oct. 1st shooting.
text: After working with the Senate Commerce, Justice, & Science Department Appropriations Subcommittee Chairman Richard Shelby, I’m pleased to announce there is additional funding in the omnibus to help defray costs incurred by law enforcement in #NV following the Oct. 1st shooting.

html: This is particularly important at a time when nearly 8 in 10 Americans who work full-time live paycheck to paycheck. Nevadans have been waiting for a break, and this is it. For example, this #taxrelief bill includes my and @SenatorTimScott provision to double the #childtaxcredit.

html: Was honored to join @SecretaryZinke as he signed the secretarial order to expand critical minerals production. #NV is 1 of the world’s largest sources of rare earth minerals. html: If you're against this bill, you're against #taxcuts for the middle class because that's what this bill is all about. And if you know that nearly 1/3 of Americans don’t have $500 to cover an emergency expense, then you know how important a few hundred extra dollars are to them.
text: If you're against this bill, you're against #taxcuts for the middle class because that's what this bill is all about. And if you know that nearly 1/3 of Americans don’t have $500 to cover an emergency expense, then you know how important a few hundred extra dollars are to them.

html: If you're against this bill, you're against giving #smallbiz the chance to actually get off the ground and hire workers. You’re against giving them a better opportunity to expand, invest, increase wages, and do what they do best: create jobs.

html: If you're against this bill, you're satisfied with the anemic 2% growth ushered in by the Obama Administration & accept it as the new normal. But I'll never accept it because I know we can do better. We already have seen our economy improve since @POTUS took office.
